name: Star Pong
description:
The battle for the the stars has begun. You, the light of the stars, must fight against the dark star to save the universe and decide the destiny  of the stars.    

Play the original pong with a new improvement: Now there will be some comets falling from above. Colliding with them will make the ball bounce.

Game modes: PVE & Local PVP

I hope you like it!

Credits: Soon
